title: COSATU Central Executive Committee Statement (COSATU - The Congress of South African Trade Unions)
text: ( Source : COSATU - The Congress of South African Trade Unions ) COSATU Central Executive Committee Statement 16 October 2015 The Congress of South African Trade Unions held a Special Central Executive Committee meeting from 14-15 October
